content: the everblooms scarf is a beginner-friendly crochet pattern featuring simple stitches half_double_crochet and single_crochet to create a soft and easy texture made with red heart super saver bitty stripes yarn and a 5 5 mm i crochet hook this scarf works up quickly and can be adjusted to any size use your favorite yarn and hook to customize it for any season or style **pattern details ** yarn red heart super saver bitty stripes medium worsted weight hook 5 5 mm i size customizable skill level beginner > grab the free pattern from my website > or purchase the ad-free pdf right here > on ravelry **join the cal newsletter here ** https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/0fde95d68d this is just one of the patterns included in our scarf of the month club collection > this pattern will be available as a > free pdf download until february 17 > 2025 at 11 59 pm est new york time > 23 59 for cal participants simply > add the pattern to your cart before > 11 59 pm est on february 17th and it > will show as $0 00 the free pattern will be available on my blog beginning on february 16 2025 at 9 00 pm est new york time 21 00 > this pattern is available for free on > my website which is monetized by ads > if you prefer an ad-free version of > the pattern it is available to > purchase from my pattern shop ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ **newsletter ** https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
